评论详情: I like the silver color & shine of this med size bag plenty room for my necessities to carry to church. The design looks “ classy “ & knock off of more expensive shoulder bags I’ve bought in past.  The chain is ok ..in color , but could’ve been leather to  look better. The chain can be moved to hand carry or shoulder  carry. I like that idea. It has a snap closure that takes a bit of push to close  it , but stays closed well, once it is snapped shut.The bottom is well balanced & sits down on surfaces good.  I planned on using it for New Year ‘s  at church & other times.  Price was good for the quality & was on sale at same time. Would recommend .  Package arrived on time, was packaged with protective foam & an extra bag enclosure to protect the bag as well. Perfectly Happy !!

Just received this bag today and my 1st impression is that it's a good quality bag. It's small but it will easily hold essential items, including a cell phone. It has 2 interior compartments. No loose strings or fraying, and the seams are well constructed as far as I can tell. Overall I'm happy with this Gucci inspired bag for a fraction of the price!
